long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Random Data Generator

Struggling to come up with creative names or ideas? The Random Data Generator extension has got you covered! With this tool, you can easily generate random movie names, first names, last names, full names, and even sentences – all at the click of a button.

Features:
	•	Movie Name Generator: Instantly get a random, fun, or unique movie title idea.
	•	Name Generators: Generate random first names, last names, or even full names for inspiration or character creation.
	•	Sentence Generator: Quickly generate random sentences for writing prompts, creativity, or fun.
	•	Simple and Quick: Just click a button to generate your desired result.

Why Install This Extension?
	•	Perfect for Writers and Creators: Generate names and sentences for your stories, characters, and ideas.
	•	Easy-to-Use: A clean, simple interface that makes generating random content quick and fun.
	•	Ideal for Fun or Inspiration: Whether you need a movie title or a name for a character, this extension can help you get started with ease.

Install the Random Data Generator and spark your creativity with just one click!
